name: TANKS ATTACK!
description:
TANKS ATTACK! or TANKS if you prefer is a simple game made a year ago in 2.5 hours during gamejam.

The aim of the game is to destroy as many enemy tanks as possible while avoiding them and their shells.

As the game progresses, the number of incoming enemy tanks increases.

Pro tip if enemy tanks collide with each other, they will destroy themselves ;-)

Another pro tip enemy tanks can shoot each other down :D

Controls:

-WASD or Arrows - move

-F1 - full screen (only in desktop version)

-Esc - return to menu

-Space - shoot

If you are interested, the sounds (including music) are from freesounds.org .

If you find any bugs, let me know about them.

Good luck :)
